DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the efficacy, safety, and tolerability of PEGASYS in participants with HBeAg-negative chronic HBV. The anticipated time on study treatment is 48 weeks, and the target sample size is 60 individuals.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of PEGASYS (Peginterferon Alfa-2a [40KD]) in Patients With Hepatitis B e Antigen (HBeAg)-Negative Chronic Hepatitis B Virus (HBV)
DOC.criteria: Adult participants 1870 years of age Positive test result for HBsAg for >6 months Naive to treatment for HBV On liver biopsy, liver disease consistent with chronic HBV, with or without compensated cirrhosis Coinfection with hepatitis A, C or D, or with Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV) Decompensated liver disease Hepatocellular cancer Systemic antiviral, antineoplastic, or immunomodulatory therapy less than or equal to 6 months before study drug Medical condition associated with chronic liver disease
